Articles.Content:
NOTICE:

This theory of Kerbal Space Program is based off of the names, Linx’s Beyond Home mod, and Matt Lowne's Kerbal Space Program movies.

 

When people think of game lore they think of like Minecraft or Fallout. However people don't think KSP has Lore. Well. I proudly announce that I'm going to make some serious lore about it. However most of it depends on Linx’s Beyond Home mod and Matt Lowne's Kerbal Space Program movies. And I do hope this amazes you.


 

When I talk about the past of  Kerbalkind I am talking about a few billion years. Like 3 billion years ago in the Kerbol system. Eve is a purple and hellish planet. Like I mean who would want to visit it? Not a lot of people. But think of the name, water, and atmosphere. The name eve has always kind of sounded kinda, like it's telling me there's lore and history. The name Eve reminds of the name: “evening”. Evening is the time of day of sunset. But this reminds of the end or after. Think of it. Why Eve named Eve. Because it was after something. Of what though? Maybe Kerbalkind started on Eve. However I am assuming Kerbalkind was dirty and polluting like us and climate change and soon Eve started to turn into a hot and unlivable word. So the Kerbals moved to Kerbin. This may also be another reason why the date starts at 0:0:00. The first seconds of Kerbals colonizing Kerbin.

 

This is my theory. And I am currently criticizing it and calling it fake. And absoloty not righ at all. Sorry. I will have to fix this. Sometime.

Edited February 25, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal

@Dr. Kerbal

If you want to base your theories off GL's mods, make sure you look at Before Kerbin and After Kerbin 

Edited February 25, 2021 by Spaceman.Spiff
